title: Surf Corner Veggie Tapas Cafe
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Formerly all veg, but as of Mar 2013, new management and also serving meat options. Pumpkin soup, freshly made meze, tofu made on the island itself. Easy to find as it's on the far right of the strips of restaurants and surf shops on Las Cucharas beach. Has Wi-Fi. Confirmed open, May 2015.
